verses.verse: "In that day <WH3117> there will be a spring <WH4726> opened <WH6605> to the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732> and to the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> for sin <WH2403> and for uncleanness. <WH5079>

It will come to pass in that day, <WH3117> says <WH5002> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies, <WH6635> that I will cut off <WH3772> the names <WH8034> of the idols <WH6091> out of the land, <WH776> and they will be remembered <WH2142> no more. <WH5030> I will also cause the prophets and the spirit <WH7307> of impurity <WH2932> to pass <WH5674> out of the land. <WH776>

It will happen that, <WH376> when anyone still prophesies, <WH5012> then his father <WH1> and his mother <WH517> who bore <WH3205> him will tell <WH559> him, <WH2421> 'You must die, because you speak <WH559> lies <WH8267> in the name <WH8034> of Yahweh; <WH3068>' and his father <WH3205> and his mother <WH517> who bore <WH3205> him will stab <WH1856> him when he prophesies. <WH5012>

It will happen in that day, <WH3117> that the prophets <WH5030> will each <WH376> be ashamed <WH954> of his vision, <WH2384> when he prophesies; <WH5012> neither will they wear <WH3847> a hairy <WH8181> mantle <WH155> to deceive: <WH3584>
but he will say, <WH559> <WH5030> 'I am no prophet, I am a tiller <WH5647> of the ground; <WH120> for I have been made a bondservant <WH7069> from my youth. <WH5271>'

One will say <WH559> to him, <WH4347> 'What are these wounds between your arms? <WH3027>' Then he will answer, <WH559> <WH5221> 'Those with which I was wounded in the house <WH1004> of my friends. <WH157>'

"Awake, <WH5782> sword, <WH2719> against my shepherd, <WH7462> and against the man <WH1397> who is close <WH5997> to me, <WH5002>" says Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies. <WH6635> "Strike <WH5221> the shepherd, <WH7462> and the sheep <WH6629> will be scattered; <WH6327> and I will turn <WH7725> my hand <WH3027> against the little ones. <WH6819>

It shall happen that in all the land, <WH776>" says <WH5002> Yahweh, <WH3068> "two <WH8147> parts <WH6310> in it will be cut off <WH3772> and die; <WH1478> but the third <WH7992> will be left in it. <WH3498>

I will bring <WH935> the third part <WH7992> into the fire, <WH784> and will refine <WH6884> them as silver <WH3701> is refined, <WH6884> and will test <WH974> them like gold <WH2091> is tested. <WH974> They will call <WH7121> on my name, <WH8034> and I will hear <WH6030> them. <WH559> I will say, <WH5971> 'It is my people;' and they will say, <WH559> <WH3068> 'Yahweh is my God. <WH430>'"
